name: Hoogh
description:
Hoogh is a fast skill game in which you have to shoot the ball to keep it in the air for as long as possible. Try to break your friends highscore for all different balls and projectiles! Can be played with one hand by tapping the screen where you want to fire the projectile towards.

Hoogh contains two modes:

Classic mode:
Choose a ball and a projectile to shoot at the ball. Shoot at the ball to keep it in the air and set the highest time as highscore. You lose when you drop the ball. Features online leaderboards for every ball-projectile combination.

Challenge mode:
You will start with a random ball and projectile and play for points instead of time. Every time you hit the ball, you will score points. Every few seconds, a new random ball will spawn. While keeping multiple balls in the air, your score will multiply on hit as well! You lose when the last ball hits the floor. Can you set the highscore?
